entry.title: Just A Human
entry.summary:
Author: FanFiction36

Rating: General AudiencesLanguage: EnglishWords: 7,564Chapters: 3/?Kudos: 532

Summary: (A current rewriting)Stiles had always been the type that needed physical contact. Hugs, cuddles, didn't matter. Then when the pack had revealed they all scented each other and he got a taste of werewolf pack family, he was addicted. But then everyone pulled away. He was pushed from the family he had come to love.Now that he was alone, Stiles is realizing just how much danger he had gotten himself into. How was he going to heal from the loss of a pack?Then it happened like a switch after an attack. The pack was back by his side like they never left. And he felt himself try to give in to it, but Stiles doesn't forgive so easily.

entry.summary:
Author: Silesaia_9

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 10,412Chapters: 8/?Kudos: 10

Summary: The world around them is slowly breaking apart. Old certainties crumble, and the line between safety and danger grows ever thinner.Amidst it all, two people find themselves navigating uncharted waters, where survival depends not just on strength, but on trust.A story that centers on loss and the search for loved ones, focusing on feelings and the slow, steady building of a solid bond, step by step.

entry.title: Unveiled
entry.summary:
Author: Dexterous_Sinistrous

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 24,198Chapters: 3/6Kudos: 357

Summary: Stiles’ hands were shaking as he took a handful of his veil, though he wished he could act bravely and just tear the material off. He slowly began to lift the veil, his heartbeat racing as he continued to look at the Alpha through the material.'There isn’t another way', Stiles reassured himself.His veil felt heavier than it should as he lifted it over his chin.Calloused hands grasped Stiles’ wrists in a tight hold.Stiles was startled, his actions halted. His veil was hanging just below his lips as he observed the Alpha.~*~Or, can love blossom while hidden by a veil?

entry.title: The Creator's Game
entry.summary:
Author: Glitter_Lips

Rating: ExplicitLanguage: EnglishWords: 84,184Chapters: 23/38Kudos: 32

Summary: Everyone in my story is dead. Alec has been a Beacon Hills resident and a McCall pack member for just over a year, and he’s finally starting to feel comfortable and safe after his near death experience at the hands of Monroe and her hunter army. He doesn’t want to get involved in the war ever again, content to play lacrosse and live his life.But Monroe isn’t finished yet, and she won’t rest until all supernatural people are wiped out for good. Her plans won’t allow Alec to stay uninvolved forever, and his past threatens to catch up with him no matter how badly he had hoped to keep those secrets buried.

entry.title: fragmentary blue
entry.summary:
Author: idyllic_dae

Rating: MatureLanguage: EnglishWords: 4,671Chapters: 1/?Kudos: 62

Summary: "He's harmless. Look at him," Derek says, and Stiles bristles."I am not—""You smell what I do," Talia speaks over him. "Do not be so easily fooled."Stiles isn't sure whose side to take. If he agrees with Talia, he argues against being set free. If he agrees with Derek, he admits he's weak and helpless. Neither option is appealing."Yes," Derek says. "But he's a kid, and he's terrified—""Actually, I'm seventeen and very brave—""—and he has no idea what he is."
